  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_1010</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_1010</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Operaciones con enteros 2</string>
            <string language="en">Operations with integers 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Operationen mit Ganzzahlen 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Exécutions avec les nombres entiers 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Operações com os inteiros 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Funzionamenti con i numeri interi 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαδικασίες με τους ακέραιους αριθμούς 2</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones los números enteros. Se estudian en esta unidad, que es la segunda parte de un grupo de dos, la multiplicación, la división y la potenciación de números enteros.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to study integers. This unit (which is the second part of a group of two units) studies the operations of multiplication, division and powers of integers.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">enteros</string>
            <string language="en">integers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">división</string>
            <string language="en">division</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">producto</string>
            <string language="en">product</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">operaciones</string>
            <string language="en">operations</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">potencias</string>
            <string language="en">powers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">números</string>
            <string language="en">numbers</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, Ganzzahlen zu studieren. Diese Maßeinheit (die 
das zweite Teil einer Gruppe von zwei Maßeinheiten ist), studiert die
Operationen der Vermehrung, der Abteilung und der Energien von 
Ganzzahlen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'étudier des nombres entiers. Cette unité (qui 
est la deuxième partie d'un groupe de deux unités) étudie les 
exécutions de la multiplication, de la division et des puissances des
nombres entiers.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações estudar 
inteiros. Esta unidade (que é a segunda parte de um grupo de 
duas unidades) estuda as operações da multiplicação, da divisão e
das potências dos inteiros.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
studiare i numeri interi. Questa unità (che è la seconda parte
di un gruppo di due unità) studia i funzionamenti di moltiplicazione,
di divisione e di potenzi dei numeri interi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
στους ακέραιους αριθμούς μελέτης. Αυτή η μονάδα (που είναι
το δεύτερο μέρος μιας ομάδας δύο μονάδων) μελετά τις 
διαδικασίες του πολλαπλασιασμού, του τμήματος και των δυνάμεων των
ακέραιων αριθμών.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ganzzahlen</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Abteilung</string>
